Important Announcements Regarding School Meal Distribution / Anuncios Importantes sobre La Distribución de Comidas Escolares

THE BOUND BROOK BOARD OF EDUCATION WILL CONDUCT A VIRTUAL BOARD MEETING AT 6:30 ON MONDAY APRIL 27, 2020. BOARD MEMBERS WILL MEET ONLINE AND THE PUBLIC WILL BE ABLE TO VIEW THE MEETING ONLINE AND PUBLIC COMMENT WILL BE DONE THROUGH DIRECT MESSAGING
